content.question: In your response, be sure to address all parts of the question. Use complete sentences; an outline or bulleted list alone is not acceptable.Respond to parts a, b, and c.Describe one significant change to European politics or society caused by nationalism in Europe during the period 1900 to 1950.Explain one way in which nationalism led to a change in European politics or society during the period 1950 to 2000.Explain one way in which nationalism contributed to a continuity in European politics or society during the period 1950 to 2000.

frqParts.text: In your response, be sure to address all parts of the question. Use complete sentences; an outline or bulleted list alone is not acceptable.Respond to parts a, b, and c.Describe one significant change to European politics or society caused by nationalism in Europe during the period 1900 to 1950.Explain one way in which nationalism led to a change in European politics or society during the period 1950 to 2000.Explain one way in which nationalism contributed to a continuity in European politics or society during the period 1950 to 2000.

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
